abstract: American officials express concern over whether military moves by Russia in eastern Ukraine are preparation for a new Russian-backed offensive that could end with separatists seizing more territory.
lead_paragraph: Western officials are unsure if plans are underway for a new Russian-backed offensive or if the moves are an effort to wring concessions from the Ukraine government.

headline.main: Putin Bolsters His Forces Near Ukraine, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Putin Bolsters His Forces Near Ukraine, U.S. Says

snippet: Western officials are unsure if plans are underway for a new Russian-backed offensive or if the moves are an effort to wring concessions from the Ukraine government.
